title: Never-Before-Seen Footage: Kim CAUGHT In Raunchy Porn With Another Man!
text: Vivid Vivid Kim Kardashian 's sex tape showed fans every inch of the future reality queen, but RadarOnline.com has uncovered even more explosive footage that got left on the cutting room floor! Click through to see never-before-released images from the raunchy sex tape that made Kardashian a household name â€“ and that she thought were buried forever! Vivid Vivid Kim Kardashian SuperStar was released ten years ago, on February 21, 2007. "You know, I think that's how I was definitely introduced to the world," Kardashian later admitted. This steamy scene didn't make it to the final cut. Vivid Vivid Kardashian lays one on then-boyfriend Ray J, while he holds the camera filming their tryst in this still from Radar's exclusive sex tape excerpt . Ray J and Kardashian split in 2006, before the film was released. CLICK THE ARROW TO WATCH THE NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN FOOTAGE. The anniversary of the release of the sex tape is a cause for celebration for Vivid honcho Steven Hirsh, who gave Radar a message for Kardashian: "I can't believe it's been 10 years. I hope you're as happy as we are with the last ten years. Congratulations on all your success." Vivid Vivid Bikini-clad Kardashian climbed on top of her man in this exclusive screen grab from Vivid's tape, which has since had "over 150-million online views," Hirsch told Radar. CLICK THE ARROW TO WATCH THE VIDEO. "It's our best selling tape of all time, and its sales continue to jump each time Kim gets back in the headlines, which is mostly all the time," Hirsch said about the celebrity porno.
